title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to improve highway transportation in the Untied States, including rural and metropolitan areas.
content: Nationwide Freight and Personal Mobility Act - Specifies a formula for the automatic authorization of additional appropriations for National Highway System (NHS) improvement projects, starting FY2010, if apportionments fall below a certain level. Revises the federal share of non-Interstate highway projects to make it: (1) 80 for non-NHS projects, and (2) 85 for NHS projects.
